pr_title: SO-4524: Allow searching by CodeType in concept search API

timeline.message: SO-4524: add concept type filtering to generic API

Revert "SO-4524: remove chapter and block"

This reverts commit d31c6aa986177338169081a54689bb5a3e9df92f.

timeline.bodyText: Please reduce these literal to two instances: CATEGORY, CODE.
timeline.author: cmark
